name: zuluword
short_description:
(Source code coming soon)

Using SHA 512 hashing, encodes any text input into 8th grade level speakable/writeable words, or compresses input  message by 3:1 ratio into unicode text, while still encrypted.  Library enables unbreakable encryption with all text communication platforms, including voice phones, ham radio, email, text, social media, open air publications.  Only individuals/groups with known password can decode the text back to the original message. 

Library comes with two technology demo Windows7 GUIs.  

Main interface is ready to equip your app with secure encoded messaging.

Optimized for American-English language.
